    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public java.lang.String configure(java.lang.String getString,
                         int spaceOption)
        Accepts a string and converts it to the proper format for encryption. Converts all digits to their corresponding letters and strips out all other nonletter characters. Converts all letters to uppercase.
        Parameters:
        getString - Input string to be preprocessed for encryption
        Returns:
        Properly processed input string.

      • configure

        public char configure(char getChar,
             int spaceOption)
        Accepts a character and converts it to the proper format for encryption. Converts all digits to their corresponding letters and strips out all other nonletter characters.
        Parameters:
        getChar - Input char to be preprocessed for encryption
        Returns:
        Properly processed input char.
